Q_DESC:
To reverse a stack without using recursion 
INPUT:
first line of input must contain the length of the list
second line of input must contain the elements to be pushed into the list
TESTCASE_1:
8
1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
The sequence of contents in stack
8 7 6 5 4 3 2 1 
Inversing the contents of the stack

The contents in stack after reversal
1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8
TESTCASE_2:
5
8 1 9 2 7
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
The sequence of contents in stack
7 2 9 1 8 
Inversing the contents of the stack

The contents in stack after reversal
8 1 9 2 7
